name: SHORT CIRCUIT (Nate Smith)
description:
Development Period: October 2018

Development Length: 1 weekend, full time

My Role: Sole Programmer, co-designer

Tools: Unity, Photoshop

SHORT CIRCUIT is a 2D competitive puzzle game where four players collect points by placing electrical cords on the board to connect their generator to as many power strips and appliances as possible. This small web app was made for my Principles of Game Design class, and is based off of a paper prototype created by myself, Max Huntington, and Conor Napier. Conor Napier created the art assets for this game, and I was responsible for programming it.
